title: ICSI CSEET June 2026 Registration Window Closes
content:
# ICSI CSEET June 2026 Registration Window Closes

Ek important update hai for all aspiring Company Secretaries! The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) ne Company Secretary Executive Entrance Test (CSEET) June 2026 session ke registration window ko close kar diya hai.

*   **Registration Closure:** The deadline for completing the online application and fee payment for the CSEET June 2026 session was February 15, 2026.
*   **Examination Schedule:** Eligible candidates جنہوں نے successfully register kiya hai, will now appear for the examination cycle, which is scheduled to be held from June 1 to June 4, 2026.
*   **Application Portal:** The official application process was conducted through the ICSI portal at smash.icsi.edu.

Candidates ko ab apni preparations par focus karna chahiye for the upcoming exams. Best wishes!

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icsi.edu/home/examination/exams-cseet)

*Published on: 16 February 2026*
